name: Lower Hall
longDescription: It's very dark here in the Lower Hall. You are grateful to have light. The stairs to the east lead back to the Upper Hall. Across from you to the west, there is another set of stairs leading to the Basement. The door to the Garage is to the north. Southwest leads to the Kitchen, southeast to the Dining Room. As you step into the hall you see a mouse hiding in the corner of the room.
shortDescription: You're in the Lower Hall. The east stairs lead back to the Upper Hall. To the west, another set of stairs lead to the Basement. The Garage is to the north. Southwest leads to the Kitchen, southeast to the Dining Room.

shadow.True: There is a pile of boxes casting a shadow.
shadow.False: There's a dark shadow in the corner that looks uncomfortably… human-shaped.

Look at.shadow: Slowly, you approach the strange shadow… then feel silly. It's just a pile of boxes left by the movers.
Look at.corner: Slowly, you approach the strange shadow… then feel silly. It's just a pile of boxes left by the movers.
Look at.mouse: The mouse appears to be frozen in place. But as you take a closer look you see that the mouse is actually dead…. and it died recently.
Look at.boxes: Those boxes are just full of your books.

Pick up.mouse: Nope! Ain't nobody got time for that right now.
